title.narrative: IRN-M-UNDP Program Agreement 4
IRN-M-UNDP Program Agreement
IRN-M-UNDP Grant Performance Report
Coverage / Output indicator for IRN-M-UNDP
CM -other10: # and % of new active and new potential foci fully investigated
CM -other 4: % of reported malaria cases that are laboratory confirmed (by RDTs or blood smear examination)
CM -other 9: # and % of confirmed cases fully investigated
CM -other 3: # and % of randomly selected laboratories showing adequate performance of all laboratories that received external evaluation
VC- other 1: # people and % of population in active malaria foci reached by IRS
CM -other 2: # and % of laboratories showing adequate performance among all laboratories that received internal quality assurance (Zone A + Zone B)
VC- other 3: Number and % of new active and residual active falciparum foci were sprayed and covered by larviciding
CM -other 5: Number and % of laboratory confirmed malaria cases receiving prompt effective anti-malaria treatment based on national guidelines in target district health facilities (Zone A + Zone B)
VC- other 2: Number of LLINs distributed to target households
CM -other 6: % of lab-confirmed uncomplicated malaria cases receiving appropriate treatment based on National Malaria Treatment Guidelines within 48 hours in target districts
CM -other 8: % of health facilities with no reported stock-out of nationally recommended antimalarial drugs lasting more than 1 week at any time during the past 3 months (Zone A + Zone B)
Proportion of confirmed malaria cases that received first-line antimalarial treatment at public sector health facilities

CM -other 7: number and % of foci affected by cross-border population movement where passive health posts are equipped with trained health staff, adequate RDTs and is responsible for malaria reporting.
Proportion of households in targeted areas that received Indoor Residual Spraying during the reporting period
Percentage of malaria foci fully investigated and classified
Percentage of confirmed cases fully investigated and classified
CM -other 1: Proportion of suspected malaria cases living in active foci that receive parasitological test
